content: जरठ {%<ab>a.</ab>%} [जॄ बा °अठ] {@--1@} Hard, solid. {@--2@} Old, aged; अयमतिजरठाः प्रकामगुर्वीः परिणतदिक्करिकास्तटीर्बिभर्ति <ls>Śi. 4. 29</ls> (where जरठ means ‘hard’ also). {@--3@} Decayed, decrepit, infirm. {@--4@} Bent, bowed down, drooping. {@--5@} Pale, yellowish-white. {@--6@} Full-grown, ripe, matured; जरठकमल <ls>Śi. 11. 14.</ls> {@--7@} Hard-hearted, cruel. --ठः {@--1@} <ab>N.</ab> of Pāṇḍu, father of the five Pāṇḍavas. {@--2@} Old age.
